name: Rainmaker: Ultimate Trading Game
description:
Fun and exciting way to experience stock trading with best companies on stock markets around the world. Become rich! Make millions and billions on high stake trades! Compete and compare your strategy against your friends.

Rainmaker offers fast paced trading experience in a nutshell. In just 30 seconds, you’ll experience 2 years of ups and downs in stock price changes.

MAIN FEATURES
• Wide range of companies listed on global stock exchanges
• Double down on bets, hedge investment & trades
• Compete and share your insights with your Facebook friends
• Weekly Tournaments - Compete every week with same starting condition
• Interested in company you’ve traded on? See company info in just one click.
• Statistics on your trading behavior

By familiarizing and learning about how stock prices changed over the course of history, you become a better trader and become richest person in the world.
